game_description: FEATURES * Colorful, unique drinks -- the more you progress, the more recipes you will learn. * After each round, spin for a random mod or event that will always keep the game unique and challenging. * Avoid permadeath! If you fail to pay your rent, you will lose the run and have to start over! * Save your progress and track your run history. * As you play through and earn more run victories, you will unlock new unique mods that will be added to your pool. SUMMARY * Work your way through rounds by serving customers to earn gold. * You must earn enough each round to pay your rent -- or else you're done for! * Save your extra gold to purchase new recipes and level up. * Reach the ultimate rank before you miss rent... or die :D * Every round will be affected by a random game mod. Tons of unique mods keep every round interesting! Some are good, some are bad, and some are just plain weird.
review_1: For a bartender Sim this is OK. Straight from the start it doesnt really tell you what to do. Picking things up i found very it and miss either doesnt pick somethign up or you do and then it drops. Took me a few mins to realise to start the game you need to eat the mushroom. Once in the game you are put in the middle of a bar with a small tutorial on how to make the first drink. As i had so many issues picking things up i found this very annoying. I kept picking up glassed and they just smashed it took a while to get used to how the physics worked. After doing the first round of puring drinks you have a little mini game which a nice way to get upgrades. you can then pay for a new recipee. This is where i got totally confused, the instructions didnt make sense about adding liquid to the mushroom and as i couldnt really pick it up took a while ti figure out what i had to do. After a while i got it but its just to buggy for my liking when you have to be quick with these types of games.
